name: Donald Stevens
text: Great pizza! Great variety of crusts! Quick service in or delivery!

name: Brigid Greenway
text: Have been hung up on by this crew at least 5 times in a 3 month time frame. Pizza was delivered on a front porch without notice or doorbell ring. Wring order and wa told next one would be free....wasn't.   Spent 14 minutes tonight trying to …More

name: john abbo
text: Just came in for a quick order and was quickly helped by jack. Offered a better deal than what we had ordered and was so quick. Thanks team!!!

name: Cheryl Kalbfleisch
text: I have great service from every hungry howies i have delivered. One of my favorite stores

name: David DiGirolamo
text: Awesome pizza love the flavored crust

name: Every-Day Joe
text: Moved here in April and have purchased pizza 2 times from this location. Both times the order was messed up and cooked incorrectly.

name: Tim Nagle
text: Kind of hard to order a pizza when nobody answers the phone so, Domino's it is. I haven't had Hungry Howie's in a while and wanted to try something different, but you don't answer your phone and your online ordering doesn't have the option to pay at the store. This is why I haven't had HH in a while.

name: John Talco
text: Waited hour 1/2 then got call from some door dash driver who was lost then was told manager would bring new pizza 1 hr later called & canceled order ,they are 2 miles away and was lied to twice, and then charged my card,second time this has happen & will never call them again.

name: Kathleen Mooney
text: Friendly staff. Inside is clean. Food is good.

name: Tracy Marlene
text: Not bad. I haven't been to Hungry Howie's in a while and was disappointed they dont sell the Steak and cheese pizza that I used to love years ago. It was the Best pizza! However, the naked wings are yummy and the pizza is tasty.

name: Stew Yatooma
text:
Owner do yourself a favor and stop responding to these reviews. You sound like an idiot and never offer to make things right with customers! Same cookie cutter response to everyone. "WE MUST DO BETTER".
DO BETTER ALREADY

name: Olivia Tressler
text: Great food! Great service! Hungry? Howies! Gotta love pizza!!

name: Jamie Clifton
text: I called in an order for two large pizzas, we waited over 55 minutes. We had a wait because they gave our pizza away to somebody else and had to remake it. When we got home the pizza that they gave us was wrong. I called the manager to let …More

name: Laverne King
text: It's AIGHT? I GUESS

name: Brendan Schafer
text: Came in to this location for the first time tonight! Lauren was working and was awesome! She was positive, very friendly and super easy to order from, because she knew exactly what everything was! I had a great experience.

name: Valerie Nagara
text: I don’t order hungry howies often, but I did today. The staff was friendly and ordering over the phone was easy. Only complaint is that when I got home and opened my pizzas up, the half cheese half olive pizza had very little olives. I …More

name: Brendan Cornelissen
text: Consistently disappointing recently with wrong orders and poor food quality

name: Kitty Fick
text: Its usually fast service with decent folks. The food is good and the place seems to be clean.

name: Brandon Schrupp
text: Lauren was a delight! Very helpful, I love the pizza here. The cinnamon bread is to die for!

name: Amelia Shina
text: Having to have come to Hungry Howie's for most occasions and for almost 3 years now I have experienced one of the unfortunate places to buy pizza at. The co-workers do not wear any type of hand gloves, and from moving to the cashier to the …More

name: Nicholas Humphrey
text: Ordered two large pizzas and a cheesy bread, none of them were cut correctly, either they halfheartedly cut it, or they need new cutters. Had to cut it ourselves. One of the pizzas was supposed to be triple pepperoni, it was only double, …More

name: Joe Zajac
text: Its okay slow service

name: marc kelly
text: Very expensive & not many coupons out there for their pizza's... "Little Cesar's" pizza is way more economical especially their cheese stuffed crust...

name: Julie Sowinski
text: Do not use for Delivery.  They must be very short staffed.  Placed an online order at 10:59 am.  I am about a 7 minute drive.  Showed out for delivery 15 minutes later.  Took until 12:45, yes that is not a typo, it took 1 hour and 45 …More

name: Lynnette Gladwin
text: Terrible! So terrible, it was like they tried to be terrible on purpose! Delivery time said 40 minutes, they didn’t show up until 70 minutes later. Our pizza was missing the toppings and was not cut! The calzones were not folded over. And …More

name: Rosie Dennis
text: Delicious pizza! Very well made. We usually go elsewhere so I figured I would give it a try. It was excellent and done when expected.

name: Adam Rzepecki
text: Ordered wings and pizza they said it would be 20 min.  Showed up 5 min early and paid.  Sat down for another 30 min.  However the food was done in there estimated 20 min.  Why I sat there next to my order for an extra 25 min.  Is beyond me …More

name: Hannah Zion
text: Great pizza. They have daily specials that are a good value. When you call on the phone you can hear the specials of the day. The team is fast and the pizza is outstanding!!!

name: Jeff Lindemann
text: Great service and love their flavored crusts!  Everyone was very friendly and reccomend this store to anyone!

name: Scottie B
text: GO TO THE HOWIES ON M-59. They actually want to do business!!

name: Mike H
text: Ordered online. Email said 40 minutes. I live 5 minutes away. It’s been 40+15 minutes and still waiting. Lesson learned I should Not have pre-tipped on the online order. …More

name: Ashley Mosseri
text: How long does it take to make a JUNIOR 8' pizza? You would guess about 20 min, instead mine took 40 while other pizzas were made before mine. I usually loved this hungry howies, but now? On top of this, one of the staff gave me attitude for ordering online. I really liked this hungry howies too :(

name: Thomas Galloway
text: Ordered online. Email said 60 minutes. I live 5 minutes away. At 60+15 minutes I called. First guy told me it could be another 20-30 minutes, the driver had my pizza but was out on 4 stops. I got upset so he put me on the phone with a …More

name: Alyse Cox
text: Every single time me or family come here something is wrong. Just ordered a deep dish and got a regular. Last time my pizza was doughy and not cooked all the way. The time before that they did the toppings wrong. The time before that they gave me someone elses order instead of mine.

name: Amanda Rappuhn
text: Absolutely the worst Hungry Howies. I have tried carry out from this location a few times and I always order well done pizza. How is well done translated to soggy wet pizza here? Who knows. It also has a very distinct taste and is just off. …More

name: Florence Robbins Paterni
text: Up to the minute preps!

name: Lawrence Klavitter
text: This Hungry Howie's is horrible. We ordered delivery and we were less than 2 miles away and they never delivered our pizza. When we called to find out what was going on they were rude and told us they don't deliver at that time of evening.

name: Matt G
text:
"Do you have any specials on a pepperoni pizza and a cheese bread?"

"We do not" …More

name: Jim Joseph
text: Yum! We go to the one in Downtown Grand Blanc next door to Planet Fitness by Aubree's, been there several times, we will be back

name: Evan Silva
text: Best pizza for the best price

name: Adam
text: Pizza is the best Hungry Howies I've ever had

name: Polgar
text: Love this pizza! I love Oakland County! | Polgar Tree Service Removal LLC | Google Trends

name: T Cox
text: I ordered online and I called to verify correct order and it was still incorrect. They knew it was wrong because when I picked it up he just set it on the counter and walked away. Don’t think I will order here anymore. Reviews are low for a reason.

name: Heather Snook
text: If they are in a hurry the quality shows in your order. I don't think I'll be returning on a busy day. The service used to be great no matter what. I think they may have a new owner or manager.

name: Mjoo7600 J
text: I have not had HH is many years. Was craving it today. It took exactly 1 1/2 hours to get my food from the time I ordered it. Not happy about that, but pizza was still good.

name: greysOcks m.
text: This quaint establishment will certainly surprise you and leave you with a most memorable experience. If you love waiting for an hour and a half for a mediocre pizza, served at room temperature, then you're in luck! Be sure to get your room temperature soda as well, it will not disappoint.

name: Dan Riggs
text: Cajun wings, made them perfect.

name: Brian Piscitelli
text: I've eaten at lots of Pizza places but this is still top 3 best.  Love HH pizza.

name: Sergio Sandoval
text: I work up the road and I'm here about 3 times a week. Lunch specials are awesome, and I like the fact they are consistent with there product. I'll continue to do business here.

name: 바카하이에나
text: Bread was delicious, very fast service. Lacked in sauce a little this time, but every other it's been nearly perfect.

name: Gillian Edwards
text: Second time ordering breadsticks to come home and no sauce

name: Leart McMuffin
text: Cant go wrong with Hungry Howies...even tho pizza prices are sky rocketing

name: Paul B
text: It blows, before I lived in the area I had them a couple times and they were fine.  Now I love in the area and they are just awful.  Under cooked pizzas, overcooked Howie bread, and refusal to help customers.  If you want hungry howies, …More

name: Donavon Hoover
text: Not great. Found the pizzas to be undercooked and not very yummy.

name: Michael Snider
text: The service was great Paul was very professional I will return many times. #servicewithasmile.

name: HUNTER MITCH
text: Every time I want pizza the shop on commerce n Union lake takes great care of me it's always fast in and out pizza is always fresh and hot and the service is great!

name: Wayne Willhelm
text: New signs!

text: Hungry Howies is my fav pizza, but thanks to this poophole I've had to switch to Jet's permanently.

name: Joshua Krupkin
text: Hungry howies used to be good 10 years ago it’s now worse than Caesar’s

name: Philip McKenna
text: Odered onlne for pickup. Went to pick up my order 20-25 min later and I stood waiting about 5 min before being aknowledged. Then was told they were just now making it. Might as well drive another 5 min to Jets.

name: Amanda Meier
text: Just ordered a pizza from there. I opened up the box, and a little black bug came crawling up the top of the box! It's 30 degrees out! That came from the store. Not from the driver or some how from outside! We are disgusted.

text: Honestly, I've ordered Hungry Howies 3 times this week, and I got embarrassed to order it again tonight so I ordered from this location. It was AWFUL. Pizza wasn't cooked, wings weren't cooked, and meat in sub was grey. Would never order from this location again.

text: Might of been one of the worst pizzas I've ever eaten in my entire life..... the reviews don't lie.
